comments.body: add the options since this is a main.

This is slightly confusing--this script (and all the scripts in templates) is not a main and is never invoked directly. Instead it is combined into a generated script in util.sh. I'll add a README explaining this so it's more clear.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@
#generate token files

KUBELET_TOKEN=$(dd if=/dev/urandom bs=128 count=1 2>/dev/null | base64 | tr -d "=+/" | dd bs=32 count=1 2>/dev/null)
KUBE_PROXY_TOKEN=$(dd if=/dev/urandom bs=128 count=1 2>/dev/null | base64 | tr -d "=+/" | dd bs=32 count=1 2>/dev/null)
